name: Headlight - Demo
description:
HEADLIGHT - AN ATMOSPHERIC 2D PLATFORMER

In Headlight, you play a funny little character with a headlight. Your task is to break through the dark and find all the keys...

Beware of what you might find or who you might have to fight!

This game is heavily relying on atmosphere - so grab those headphones and listen to the amazing soundtrack we created. After all, 

ENJOY! 

This is a project developed over the extend of a weekend - Unity course. 

We developed this game as a practical exercise in our 3rd Semester. The game lays heavy focus on atmosphere, all designs, music and code was done by us. 

Who are we? 

- A team of 4 students from the HfG - University of applied sciences in Schwäbisch Gmünd. Check our links down below! 

Cheers! 

- Lucca
